remarks: The law of concretion.  Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61.  This version of ~ opelopab uses bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable conditions."  (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.)
statement:
opelopabf.x $e |- F/ x ps $.
opelopabf.y $e |- F/ y ch $.
opelopabf.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
opelopabf.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
opelopabf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopabf.4 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
opelopabf $p |- ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> ch ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
